content.value: New year, new challenges and for me: a new job. I'm a Developer Advocate for @aiven_io so if you like data, clouds or open source then keep an eye on what I'm up to. Wishing everyone a happy and healthy 2021 whether your challenges are old or new :)
content.html: New year, new challenges and for me: a new job. I'm a Developer Advocate for @aiven_io so if you like data, clouds or open source then keep an eye on what I'm up to. Wishing everyone a happy and healthy 2021 whether your challenges are old or new :)
